item.title: Markdown Formatting Demo
item.description:
This example Markdown file compliments of markdown-it.github.io

h1 Heading 8-)

h2 Heading

h3 Heading

h4 Heading

h5 Heading
h6 Heading

Horizontal Rules

Typographic replacements

Enable typographer option to see result.

(c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +-

test.. test… test….. test?….. test!….

!!!!!! ???? ,, – —

“Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’

Emphasis

This is bold text

This is bold text

This is italic text

This is italic text
